# metsynd

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of metsynd package is to diagnose metabolic syndrome. This is based on the NCEPATPIII guidelines and IDF criteria.This package will be useful in clinics for patients with high index of suspicion.

## Installation

You can install the development version of metsjuly like so:

``` r
# install.packages("metsynd")
```

## Example


```{r example}
library(metsynd)
## basic example code
```



```
metsynd(Data)
```
